name: durable
content:

able to last and be used for a long time without becoming damaged: The machines have to be made of durable materials. The trays are made from cedar, which is light and durable.

not breaking easilystrongYou will need a strong cardboard box to carry all those books.toughCeramic tiles are tougher than plastic shower screens.sturdyYou'll need sturdy boots for this weather.solidYou will need to build a good solid base for your shed.hard-wearingCotton canvas is the most hard-wearing fabric.

able to continue to exist for a long time: The resolution calls for a durable peace settlement. With these constituencies, the Democratic Party built itself a durable long-term majority.
able to do something for a long time without getting tired or being injured: He has a reputation as the most durable player in baseball history.
More examplesFewer examplesThis office desk is durable, lightweight and able to sustain a load of up to 110 lbs.Less expensive, pigmented leather is more durable because it is coated with a layer of paint.There are successful, durable, multi-lingual republics such as Switzerland.We need a durable strategy that can yield long-term results.The World Cup midfielder may not be the most glamorous of the new players but could prove one of the most durable.
